I had same problem, my media players did not like the long label on the download. Suggest you re-name as "Bruce Springsteen - The Promise" & delete the rest of the label & hopefully it should then work.

Regards 
Weavod

yep, good advice weavod - i think it's possibly the "." in one of the folder titles, possibly makes windows think it's a file type.

rename all the folders to something shorter & simpler, except for "video ts". then it burns fine, thanks.
